com.invoices.service

Class InvoiceStatusService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.invoices.service.InvoiceStatusService

  • public class InvoiceStatusService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is annotated as a service. It is the service bean for the InvoiceStatus entity
    Author:
    psoutzis

    • Method Detail

      • determineStatus

        public InvoiceStatus determineStatus(IsApplicable sent,
                                     IsApplicable paid)
        Method will return the status of the invoice (e.g. Sent but Unpaid, or Sent and Paid, etc..)
        Parameters:
        sent - Determines if the invoice was sent to the client.
        paid - Determines if the invoice was paid.
        Returns:
        The status of the invoice

      • getUnsentUnpaid

        public InvoiceStatus getUnsentUnpaid()
        Method returns status of the invoice as unpaid and unsent.
        Returns:
        The record who has paid and sent both set as IsApplicable.NO

      • getSentUnpaid

        private InvoiceStatus getSentUnpaid()
        Method returns status of the invoice as sent, but still unpaid.
        Returns:
        The record who has sent as IsApplicable.YES and paid set as IsApplicable.NO

      • getUnsentPaid

        private InvoiceStatus getUnsentPaid()
        Method returns status of the invoice as unsent, but paid.
        Returns:
        The record who has sent as IsApplicable.NO and paid set as IsApplicable.YES

      • getSentPaid

        private InvoiceStatus getSentPaid()
        Method returns status of the invoice that was sent and paid for.
        Returns:
        The record who has paid and sent both set as IsApplicable.YES
